Do you want me to say something other than a masterpiece about this game??But the ending of this episode was very ambiguous, and after all these years, many things are still unclear, like G-Man and....I hope Half-Life 3 will release before I die

18 a√±os... Si 18 a√±os esperando la tercera parte, en 2007 ten√≠a pelo largo y hoy con 40 ya tengo canas en las pelotas de tanto esperar la interminable parte 3....

Que alguno se ponga la 10 y empiecen a desarrollar lo que todo el mundo esta esperando cerrar la historia con la tercer parte porque los jugadores no somos eternos nos estamos haciendo viejos o nos podemos dar un palo en la calle volviendo a casa del laburo con cansancio, estr√©s producidos por la jornada laboral y nos iremos de este mundo sin saber que pudo pasar con las Consecuencias imprevistas de Gordon Freeman y Alyx.

Came back to complete it after i played 4 hours of gameplay a long time ago. Nice sequal overall but i want Half-Life 3. The game isn't complete without an ENDING , if Valve says that they will no longer consider to work in the future at a potential Half-Life 3 and we remain with this ending, the Half-Life franchise is cooked. Hope when the Left4Dead franchise has the 20th years aniversary we get more news about Half-Life 3 , L4D3 and TF3. I hope in the future that Valve will no longer be allergic to number 3.

A game with the most hated cliffhanger endings and came bundled with the Orange Box alongside engine updates.

Despite being shorter than Half-Life 2 it feels more like an actual game that knows what it has to do.
Environments feel more detailed and more dense, there are a lot more interactions with other characters or them having interactions with eachother (Griggs and Sheckley, Kleiner and Magnusson for example).

Overall, it is more charming in all aspects.

It's a good game but it definitely got stale. I loved half-life 1 and 2 but half-life 2 is hard to beat. episode 1 and 2 didn't hit the spot. The movement is way too fast and I often found myself bumping into walls. it's also really annoying when NPCs block your path. i hope they make half-life 2 episode 3 but that will likely never happen
TAKING THE GNOME TO THE SHIP IS NOT WORTH IT
One of the best 5.6 hours of my life, yet that dumbass gnome should get executed by mexican cartel.
